name: KuGou Temporary Cache File
summary: Learn about .KGTEMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: KGTEMP files are typically stored in the following location:
KuGou is a popular music streaming and download service used primarily in China. It is available to download for Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.

description: A KGTEMP file is a temporary cache file created by KuGou, a popular Chinese music application. It is the same as an .MP3 file but named using an md5 algorithm. KGTEMP files are used to store information about recently played MP3 songs so it can be quickly accessed by the KuGou app at a later time.
